title: Statement by the Press Secretary on the Visit of President Garcia of Peru to the White House | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 11, 2010

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on the Visit of President Garcia of Peru to the White House




“On Tuesday, June 1, President Obama will welcome President Alan Garcia of Peru for a meeting at the White House.  Peru is an important partner with the United States and the President looks forward to the opportunity to discuss a wide range of bilateral, hemispheric, and global issues with President Garcia.”
